item.title: Hello World
item.description: It’s finally working! I’ve gotten a bit of HTML and Hugo put together. It is not much at all, but it is a start–that’s what counts! Otherwise, please pardon the… well, it’s not even dust. It is a cloud of crap circling and funneling.
